summary: Retexture designed to look similar to the Apprentice and Conjurer(Adept) Robes from Oblivion. NOTE: [Female RobesHoods have not been re-textured]
descriptionHtml:
Re-texture designed to look similar to the Apprentice and Conjurer(Adept) Robes from Oblivion. 

Texture practice. 1st re-texture uploaded to the Nexus. Inspiration from the Oblivion Mage robes. I may do other robes in the future but I won\'t promise anything. NOTE: [Female Robes have not been re-textured] And I don\'t plan on it until the CK is released. This was just done because I felt the robes needed a little somethin\' somethin\'.

Contents
-------------
Apprentice Robe + Apprentice Hood (Green)
Adept Robe + Adept Hood (Blue)

Install
--------
EASY: Use Nexus Mod Manager

EXTRACT: Copy Data into steamapps/common/skyrim folder. Merge files if necessary.
author: Jeckler216
